pyTest:
def test_linear_search(self):
        self.assertEqual(linear_search([3, 7, 1, 9, 5], 7), 1)
        self.assertEqual(linear_search([3, 7, 1, 9, 5], 5), 4)
        self.assertEqual(linear_search([3, 7, 1, 9, 5], 2), -1)
        self.assertEqual(linear_search([], 1), -1)
